name: Fighter Mage Bard
description: FighterMageBard is a casual, yet captivating miniature rpg experience. Choose between the game's three classes: a fighter for quick domination of the game; a mage for a more balanced approach and better challenge; or the weakest link- the bard, for a real test of your strength! The game can be beaten within an hour by the experienced player, but with secret bosses and hidden upgrades, there's plenty of replay value to be found in this pint-sized adventure!
